subject: ralph-mail01-gmail-only-implementation-status
content:
MAIL-01 GMAIL-ONLY IMPLEMENTATION STATUS SUMMARY

Mail-01 is successfully operating as a Gmail-only email client. No active SendGrid dependencies remain in the codebase. The transition is 100% complete and production-ready.

recent_commits: 481528a9: Complete transition from SendGrid to Gmail
d49c3718: Transition Mail-01 from SendGrid to Gmail
